sqlQuery.name: Bfmv
sqlQuery.sql: select sa.name ,type ,description ,observed_otus ,round(Chao_1,4) as Chao_1 ,round(Shannon,4) as Shannon ,round(Simpson,4) as Simpson FROM apidbtuning.sampleattributes sa, (Select name ,observed_otus ,Chao_1 ,Shannon ,Simpson from RESULTS.AlphaDiversity ad, Apidbtuning.Sampledownstream sd where sd.output_protocol_app_node_id = ad.PROTOCOL_APP_NODE_ID) ad where sa.name = ad.name

sqlQuery.name: Alias
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT sa.name, sa.name as old_name FROM apidbTuning.SampleAttributes sa
